Name: Vortex Vanquisher
Title: Golden Majesty: Vortex Vanquisher
Desc: Folklore spoke of a vast shadow entrenched in the depths of the ocean capable of swallowing passing warships...\nAt tale's end, they believe that Rex Lapis once wielded a spear that pierced the rainbow, pinning the churning vortex that had once terrorized the oceans in the center of the deep sea.

Talent.Name: Vortex Vanquisher
Talent.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.
When your active character is protected by a $[K6] Character Status or a $[K6] Combat Status, you deal +1 DMG.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Skill:</color> If you have a Combat Status that grants a $[K6] on your side, add 1 $[K6] point to that Combat Status. (Once per Round)
(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3204}Polearm Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
